articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
The Bitcoin of data? 
Sounds intriguing 🤔

Jamiebones: #30daysoftext
Day 15
Explain a decentralized storage protocol
Arweave: Decentralized Storage for the Permanent Web
Imagine a storage system for your data that's not controlled by any single company or government. That's the promise of decentralized storage protocols like Arweave
articles.title: The Bitcoin of data? Sounds intriguing 🤔

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
❤️❤️❤️❤️

Patrick Skinner (🧱, 🚀): This one gets personal...
@developer_dao isn't just my favorite DAO.
It is:
- My Web3 Home. 
- Where I go to succeed.
- Where I go to fail.
- Where I go for help.
- Where I go to lift others up.
- Where I truly believe in "WAGMI."
#30daysoftext

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re @POKTnetwork follows the spirit of web3!

Jamiebones: #30daysoftext Day 18
Discuss how @POKTnetwork provides decentralized web3 infrastructure.
@POKTnetwork's approach to Web3 infrastructure takes a decentralized route, offering developers a resilient, censorship-resistant, and scalable foundation for their blockchain projects.
articles.title: Re @POKTnetwork follows the spirit of web3!

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re @HardhatHQ is the EVM framework of choice for @Jamiescript 👀
What do you prefer? 🧐

Jamiebones: #30daysoftext Day 17. Favourite framework:
In programming, a framework is a tool that provides pre-built components or solutions aimed at accelerating the development process. When it comes to developing Ethereum smart contracts, Hardhat is my tool of choice.
articles.title: Re @HardhatHQ is the EVM framework of choice for @Jamiescript 👀 What do you prefer? 🧐

articles.description:
❤️❤️❤️

Jamiebones: #30daysoftext
Day 16
Write about your favourite DAO
Developers DAO, D_D is a DAO made for developers of varying expertise. The DAO currently exist as a closed community where one can gain access by buying 400 $CODE Token or applying to a membership scholarship run every month.

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT swaresh binaykiya
Power of Decentralized Storage
Imagine you're an avid photographer, capturing precious moments of life. You store these memories in a cloud service. 
One day, the unexpected happens – a server glitch wipes out your entire gallery. Heart-wrenching, right?
